DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether catheter-based closure patent foramen ovale effective prevent paradoxical embolization nitrogen bubble simulate dive .
DOC.brief_title: Nitrogen Bubble Detection After Simulated Dives Divers With PFO After PFO Closure
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study determine whether catheter-based closure patent foramen ovale ( PFO ) effective prevent paradoxical embolization nitrogen bubble simulate dive . Ultrasonographic detection venous arterial nitrogen bubble perform diver surface simulated dive hyperbaric chamber . Divers observe two different dive profile - Dive A ( dive 18 80 min bottom time ) dive B ( dive 50 20 min bottom time ) , perform accord US Navy Air decompression procedure 1996 . For dive two group compare : Divers PFO diver previous catheter-based closure PFO . The study observational . Sonographic detection bubble perform simulated dive part train program diver . Two different dive , previously document generate significant amount venous nitrogen bubble , choose . The primary end-point positive transcranial doppler test ( define one bubble detect either native breathing Valsalva maneuver ) . Inclusion criterion : 1 ) previously diagnose PFO PFO occlude catheter-based procedure , 2 ) sign informed consent Exclusion criterion : 1 ) another dive perform precede 24 hour , 2 ) another previously diagnose right-to-left shunt , 3 ) disagreement include study This study single-center .
DOC.criteria: 1. previously diagnose PFO PFO occlude catheterbased procedure 2. sign inform consent Exclusion criterion : 1. another dive perform precede 24 hour 2. another previously diagnose righttoleft shunt 3. disagreement include study
